data.name: StatusEnterVideoDescription
data.value: Enter Video Name and Description Information

data.name: StatusEnterStartSecond
data.value: Enter Starting Second (within GPS Sequence) for Video

data.name: PromptOKContinue
data.value: Press OK when ready to continue...

data.name: FileDlgFilterInput
data.value: NMEA Stream (*.nmea)|*.nmea|GPS eXchange Format (*.gpx)|*.gpx|PalmOS GPS App Log (*.pdb)|*.pdb|FS Video Text (*.xml)|*.xml|FS Video (*.fsr)|*.fsr|All Files (*.*)|*.*

data.name: FileDlgFilterOutput
data.value: FS Video (*.fsr)|*.fsr|FS Video Text (*.xml)|*.xml|NMEA Stream (*.nmea)|*.nmea|All Files (*.*)|*.*

data.name: CPHelpCtl_tbName
data.value: Internal name of video; listed in Flight Simulator's Flight Video dialog as name of video

data.name: CPHelpCtl_tbDescription
data.value: Internal description of video; listed in Flight Simulator's Flight Video dialog as description of video

data.name: CPHelpCtl_cbStartSec
data.value: Used to skip the specified number of seconds from the beginning of the GPS sequence

data.name: CPHelpCtl_cbTotalSec
data.value: Used to limit the length of the video to the specified number of seconds, maximum

data.name: CPHelpCtl_cbResequenceTo
data.value: Used to resequence the time sequence to the specified date and time (instead of using the date and time recorded in the GPS sequence)

data.name: CPHelpCtl_ntbTicksPerSec
data.value: Used to set the number of video frames generated per second (affects file size)

data.name: CPHelpCtl_cbMinimumAlt
data.value: Sets the 'minimum altitude' allowed in the video (useful if part of GPS sequence was recorded on while on the ground)

data.name: CPHelpCtl_cbReduceJitter
data.value: Selects heuristics to help reduce jumpiness resulting from variability in GPS data (experimental feature)

data.name: HelpNone
data.value: No help available for this item.

data.name: StatusSelectValidOperation
data.value: Please Reselect; Current Operation Not Supported

data.name: HelpCtl_tbSourceFn
data.value: Enter source file name. Use drop-down in Source file selection dialog to see supported types for selected target (if any)

data.name: HelpCtl_tbDestFn
data.value: Enter target file name. Use drop-down in Destination file selection dialog to see supported types for selected source (if any)

data.name: HelpCtl_rbToSim
data.value: Check to (convert, if necessary, and) play source file in Simulator

data.name: HelpCtl_rbToFile
data.value: Check to convert indicated source file to indicated destination file

data.name: HelpCtl_cbPlayMethod
data.value: Select method for playing video in Simulator

data.name: HelpCtl_btnViewLogCmd
data.value: Push to view log generated by previous operation

data.name: HelpCtl_btnSourceFileOpen
data.value: Push to open Source file selection dialog

data.name: HelpCtl_btnDestFileOpen
data.value: Push to open Destination file selection dialog

data.name: HelpCtl_btnConvertCmd
data.value: Invoke currently selected play or convert operation
